attributes.action: Do NOT cancel Easter in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Ensure that  blatant religious discrimination against Christians in the UK is not tolerated and will be addressed
attributes.background:
Cancelling Easter in a Christian country is no less than religious discrimation against Christianity whilst the celebration of all other faiths are actively encouraged. 
This is religious discrimination

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

There are no plans to cancel Easter so we don't know what you are referring to.
